title: Valuable Leap Year
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>This year is a leap year, huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>It’s a valuable year<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Valuable…. You say, but do you do that many things in 1 day to be able to say that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yeah! I can eat 1 more day worth of food, get 1 more day worth of sleep….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>….Honoka, you’re that kind of person….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Plus, I can spend 1 more day with Umi-chan!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>!? W-, well…. You can do that too….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I can play 1 more day with Umi-chan and Kotori-chan, talk 1 more day with everyone from μ’s, it’s really great!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>If you put it like that, then I guess I too feel quite fortunate….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ahaha! Then it really is a valuable year!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
